# Sub-Issue Documentation

This directory contains documentation for creating a sub-issue in the **bf56rrxbrs-crypto/agent-ai** repository.

## Purpose

This documentation was created in response to a request to create a sub-issue for [agent-ai#2](https://github.com/bf56rrxbrs-crypto/agent-ai/issues/2) ("Set up Copilot instructions") to automate the setup task.

## Why Documentation Instead of Direct Issue Creation?

In this project context, the automation tools used do not have the necessary GitHub token permissions or repository/organization authorization to create issues via the GitHub API. Instead, this comprehensive documentation provides everything needed to manually create the sub-issue.

## How to Use

### Option 1: Quick Creation (Recommended for immediate action)
1. Open `SUB_ISSUE_QUICK_CREATE.md`
2. Follow the step-by-step instructions
3. Copy the provided content into GitHub's new issue form
4. Submit the issue

### Option 2: Detailed Review (Recommended for planning)
1. Open `SUB_ISSUE_agent-ai-2.md`
2. Review the complete specification
3. Customize as needed for your specific needs
4. Use the detailed information to create the issue with any modifications

## Creating the Issue

To create the actual sub-issue in GitHub:

1. Navigate to: https://github.com/bf56rrxbrs-crypto/agent-ai/issues/new
2. Copy the title from either documentation file
3. Copy the body/description from your chosen file
4. Add labels: `enhancement`, `automation`, `copilot`, `sub-issue`
5. Link to parent issue #2 (GitHub will auto-link if you use "Part of #2")
6. Assign appropriate team member(s)
7. Submit
